questions.skill: Ensure subject-verb agreement in complex sentences
questions.question:
The collection of rare manuscripts, along with several first-edition books, _______ recently been acquired by the university library.

Which choice completes the text so that it conforms to the conventions of Standard English?
questions.explanation: The subject is 'collection' (singular), not 'manuscripts' or 'books.' The phrase 'along with several first-edition books' is a parenthetical addition and does not change the number of the subject. A singular subject requires a singular verb: 'has.'
